Key Match Events: Shreyas Iyer and Sanju Samson added an 84-run stand in 47 balls
Ravindra Jadeja hit 45 not out off 18 balls
Pre-Game Insights: Captain Rohit Sharma backed Sanju Samson ahead of the series
India have a problem of plenty in the batting unit
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma praised the middle-order for consistently stepping up
Rohit Sharma said the team would look at giving opportunities to the ones on the bench
Miscellaneous Highlights: India took an unbeatable 2-0 lead in the series
The two teams meet in the final T20I on Sunday
